code: let prodData=null;let vAddCartData=null;let vGetCartData=null;const getProdData=url=>{if(prodData===null){return fetch(url,{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(r=>r.json().then(data=>({status:r.status,body:data}))).then(obj=>{return obj.body;}).catch(err=>{return err;});}else{return Promise.resolve(getProdData);}};const getCartData=(url,param)=>{if(vGetCartData===null){return fetch(url,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(param)}).then(r=>r.json().then(data=>({status:r.status,body:data}))).then(obj=>{return obj.body;}).catch(err=>{return err;});}else{return Promise.resolve(vGetCartData);}};const addCartData=(url,param)=>{if(vAddCartData===null){return fetch(url,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(param)}).then(r=>r.json().then(data=>({status:r.status,body:data}))).then(obj=>{return obj.body;}).catch(err=>{return err;});}else{return Promise.resolve(vAddCartData);}};export{getProdData,addCartData,getCartData};
